channel.title: EvilThoutz Virus Fix (READ)
channel.description:
As a noob over in the Priavte Server Downloads section released a "keylogger" that infects the people you choose.. Well, it infects you.. and it has over 100 downloads.. So here is a tut on how to remove it.
Well, here is the solution.
Go to search and serach for msvbvm60.dll Wait about 5min and you should see 3 msvbvm60.dll.
Delete all of them and then download msvbvm60.dll from here: http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?msvbvm60
Also, in search, search for "Keylogger" in C drive only.. Delete it once you see it.
Good luck, and it comes with read me, read at the end and it should tell you where to put the Dll file.

item.title: EvilThoutz Virus Fix (READ)
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Uh why would you post it over here, basically no one who uses this side of the boards don’t mess around with private servers. If a mod moves this over to the downloads section i’ll sticky it for a while.

Read full topic

As a noob over in the Priavte Server Downloads section released a “keylogger” that infects the people you choose…
Well, it infects you… and it has over 100 downloads… So here is a tut on how to remove it.

Well, here is the solution.

Go to search and serach for msvbvm60.dll
Wait about 5min and you should see 3 msvbvm60.dll.

Delete all of them and then download msvbvm60.dll from here: http://www.dll-files.com/dllindex/dll-files.shtml?msvbvm60

Delete it once you see it.

Good luck, and it comes with read me, read at the end and it should tell you where to put the Dll file.
